title: Review a Third-Party SOC 1 Report
description: An IT auditor reviews the SOC 1 report for the company's payroll provider.

tasks.description: Obtain the latest SOC 1 Type II report from the payroll provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the correct report.

tasks.description: Review the 'User Control Considerations' section to identify controls that the company is responsible for implementing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies that the company is responsible for reviewing and approving payroll registers before they are processed.

tasks.description: Test to ensure the company is effectively performing the user control considerations, such as the payroll register review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that the payroll manager signs off on the register each pay period, satisfying the control requirement.
